person_1.name: Gleb Doykhen
person_1.description: Aspiring billionaire, future founder of digital gaming empire. PPE at Warwick University. Leisurely poet, artist, music producer and philosopher.

person_2.name: Saveliy Elisov
person_2.description: Visionary, philosopher, philanthropist, and aspiring Physics Nobel prize winner. Ten years of experience in running small businesses.

person_3.name: Dmitry Elisov
person_3.description: MIPT graduate, ex co-founder & CTO of 7 startups, former chief software architect of enterprise-scale software used by BMW, Apple, Allianz, etc

person_4.name: Nikolay Elisov
person_4.description: MIPT graduate, engineer- mathematician; investor and entrepreneur, realized more than 50 projects during the last 20 years, sold ready-made businesses for more than $75m

person_5.name: Polina Khudyakova
person_5.description: MAI graduate. ex-PR manager Lenovo, Avast, Kyocera, Hypefactory

person_6.name: Saveliy Lenivin
person_6.description: California State University, Northridge graduate. Bachelor degree of Higher School of Economics, business and marketing. Managed $1m/year ad campaigns
